name: SafeInHome
description: SafeinHome empowers people to live independently in their own homes and communities using a remote supports staff and assistive technologies.

name: TTAC
description: TTAC provides training and technical assistance free of charge to schools and agencies supporting students with disabilities

name: PRCSaltillo
description: Experience the life-changing joy of meaningful communication through our world-renowned, customized AAC vocabularies, assistive technology, and our unmatched training and personalized support.

name: Northern Virginia Resource Center for the Deaf & Hard of Hearing Persons
description: Experience the life-changing joy of meaningful communication through our world-renowned, customized AAC vocabularies, assistive technology, and our unmatched training and personalized support.

name: Children's Assistive Technology Service
description: C.A.T.S. accepts donations of gently used pediatric adaptive equipment, cleans and refurbishes it, and provides it to children with disabilities that need it at no cost.
